text: Herbert Singerman (born 23 April 1946) is a Canadian wrestler. He competed in two events at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Canada Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Montreal Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in wrestling Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Canada
title: Herbert Singerman
